summary: Provides a suite of unit tests for the Microsoft Authentication Library application layer, covering token acquisition and refresh, client capability merging, byte/string handling, authority alias processing, account grouping, HTML certificate extraction, telemetry collection, and offline caching across public, confidential, and client application types.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the authentication library's core functionalities, prevent regressions, and ensure compliance with authentication standards across diverse usage scenarios.
